MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL49 postcode area of Porthmadog, affecting properties in Snowden Street,  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:07AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:51PM on 22nd January 2021.
